question.body: Which of the following are structures of the muscular system?

response.feedback: Partially correct. But there is another organ on this list that forms the bulk of the muscular system.
Partially correct. But there is another organ on this list that forms the bulk of the muscular system.
Incorrect. Cardiac muscle is a type of muscle tissue but is not part of the muscular system.
Incorrect. Ligaments join bones together for stabilization of joints and are not part of the muscular system.
Correct. The muscular system is comprised of two main structures: tendons and skeletal muscle.
Incorrect. The muscular system is comprised of tendons and skeletal muscle but ligaments are not part of this system.

part.hint: The musuclar system is associated with movement of bones.
